law.catch_line: Penalties for violation of KRS 315.400 to 315.410.

text.section: A person engaged in the wholesale distribution of prescription drugs who unknowingly violates any provision of KRS 315.400 to 315.410 may be fined not more than five thousand dollars ($5,000).

A person engaged in the wholesale distribution of prescription drugs who acts with gross negligence and violates any provision of KRS 315.400 to 315.410 may be fined not more than fifteen thousand dollars ($15,000).
A person engaged in the wholesale distribution of prescription drugs who knowingly violates any provision of KRS 315.400 to 315.410 may be fined not more than one hundred thousand dollars ($100,000).

law.history: Created 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 124, sec. 9, effective July 15, 2008.
